entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 26 %
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
